title: Ayaz Galu
text: Ayaz Galu (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Ayāz Galū) is a village in <a href="Mahur%20Rural%20District">Mahur Rural District</a>, <a href="Mahvarmilani%20District">Mahvarmilani District</a>, <a href="Mamasani%20County">Mamasani County</a>, <a href="Fars%20Province">Fars Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 40, in 12 families.
